entry.value: ----associate CREATE TABLE associate ( sl_no INTEGER, seat_no VARCHAR(20), employee_id INTEGER, employee_name VARCHAR(50), email_id VARCHAR(100), card_no INTEGER, designation VARCHAR(50), mobile_no VARCHAR(15), extn INTEGER, occupied_from_date VARCHAR(15), allocation_till_date VARCHAR(15), won_swon INTEGER, asset_id1 VARCHAR(20), project_id VARCHAR(20), project_name VARCHAR(20), client_group VARCHAR(20), sub_unit_sub_isu VARCHAR(20), unit_isu VARCHAR(20), unallocated CHAR(1), base_branch VARCHAR(20), shift VARCHAR(10), manager VARCHAR(50) )
--floor plan CREATE TABLE floor_plan ( id INTEGER, floor_id VARCHAR(20), cube_id VARCHAR(20), row_num INTEGER, column_num INTEGER, cube_num INTEGER, visible CHAR(1), specialtxt VARCHAR(200) )
------ floor list CREATE TABLE floor_list ( odc_id VARCHAR(20), odc_name VARCHAR(30), office_name VARCHAR(30), city VARCHAR(30), floor INTEGER, wing VARCHAR(20), hit_count INTEGER )
